summary: This is an bedroll you can craft, then place on the ground and sleep on anywhere.
descriptionHtml:
This is an bedroll you can craft, then place on the ground and sleep on anywhere. 
Crafted on the taning rack and require two bear, cave bear or tiger pelts

To use simply drop bedroll on ground, activate it and it will behave a bit strange so just drag it where you want and activate again and it\'s useable, activate while sneaking to pick up.
author: Zaria
